xeolabs

Lindsay Kay

3D software engineer / WebGL developer

Twitter LinkedIn Github


My chapter on SceneJS for OpenGL Insights is now free to download!

Portfolio

Highlights

  • Freelance software engineer specializing in Web-based 3D visualization
  • Built the WebGL rendering tech for the BioDigital Human, BIMData.io, BIMSurfer and SolidComponents
  • Created three open source WebGL libraries: xeokit, xeogl and SceneJS
  • Contributing author on OpenGL Insights

Projects

February 08, 2019

xeokit - 3D SDK for Web-based BIM and CAD

Created and maintaining xeokit, a dual-licensed WebGL-based SDK for viewing high-detail 3D BIM and CAD data in the browser.

Users include Konstrucktum, OpenProject, Blue Star Qatar, uniZite, Eyeonim and D-Studio.

  • WebGL, BIM, BIMServer, glTF
  • Berlin, Germany
  • http://xeokit.io

June 29, 2018

The BioDigital Human™

Built the core WebGL rendering technology for the BioDigital Human anatomy visualization platform, which now serves over 3 million users. Contracted since 2009 to help maintain the platform.

  • WebGL, SceneJS
  • Manhattan, New York
  • Read case study >>

June 28, 2018

BIMData™ Online 3D BIM Viewer

Built the 3D BIM viewer for BIMData.io, a cutting-edge platform to manage your construction projects that provides an all-in-one solution to visualize, check, edit and share building information. Contracted since 2018 to help maintain the platform.

  • WebGL, glTF, xeogl
  • Lyon, France
  • Read case study >>

June 27, 2018

BIMSurfer Online BIM Viewer

Developed the 3D viewer within BIMSurfer, the first open source WebGL-based IFC viewer.

  • WebGL, xeogl
  • Amsterdam, Netherlands
  • http://bimsurfer.org

June 11, 2018

SolidComponents™ Online CAD Viewer

Developed the 3D CAD viewer within the SolidComponents™ online product catalog.

  • WebGL, 3DXML, xeogl
  • Halmstad, Sweden
  • Read case study >>

March 10, 2018

xeogl - WebGL engine for ArchViz & CAD

Created xeogl, an open source JavaScript library for WebGL-based 3D visualization.

Users include BIMSurfer, BIMData, SolidComponents, Airsquire, Energie IP, uniZite and Enka Systems.

  • http://xeogl.org

March 09, 2018

SceneJS - WebGL engine for STEM

Created SceneJS, one of the first widely-used open source WebGL-based 3D engines.

Users include BioDigital, the Open Source BIM Collective and the ESA.

  • http://scenejs.org

February 16, 2018

xeometry - WebGL Library for viewing glTF

Created xeometry, an experimental open source JavaScript library for viewing and interacting with 3D glTF models on WebGL.

  • http://xeometry.org

February 16, 2018

Creating WebGL Demos for zSpace using xeogl

Partnered with zSpace to develop WebGL-based demos for the zSpace 300 system using the xeogl library.

  • WebGL, WebVR, xeogl
  • Sunnyvale, CA
  • Read case study >>

February 16, 2018

Wind Turbine Testing for Windflow™

Contracted with Windflow Technology Ltd to number-crunch terrabyte-sized datasets to verify turbine power efficiency and structural performance.

  • Postgres, Java
  • Christchurch, New Zealand
  • https://windflow.co.nz
